item.title:
Zoey Deutch, Phoebe Dynevor, Mckenna Grace, Madeline Brewer, Daryl McCormack, Diane Lane, Kyle Chandler to star in upcoming thriller ‘ANNIVERSARY’.
The film is described as following a very close-knit family that is torn apart as new movement “The Change” envelops the U.S.
item.author: FilmUpdates

item.title:
David Lowery’s ‘MOTHER MARY’ is rumored to begin filming next month.
The epic pop melodrama follows a fictional musician (Anne Hathaway) and her relationship with an iconic fashion designer (Michaela Coel).
item.author: FilmUpdates

item.title: Alia Bhatt has been named as the newest Global Brand Ambassador for Gucci.
item.author: FilmUpdates
FilmUpdates

item.title:
Kathryn Newton, Angus Cloud, and Will Catlett join Melissa Barrera, Alisha Weir and Dan Stevens in Universal Pictures’ untitled monster thriller from Radio Silence.
The film will be released in theaters on April 19, 2024 release.
(https://deadline.com/2023/05/universal-radio-silence-monster-thriller-kathryn-newton-angus-cloud-will-catlett-1235365261/…)
